item.description:
Comedy featuring Bobby Niles, Joe Espinola, Larry Starr, Erin Livingston Carroll, Sam Rodriguez and Sal Votano. FYI...Adult content and language...Discount tickets $10.00 for meetup members.
This event is upstairs in the Play Loft. Please reply by Nov 13th and I will give them a count, although I doubt they will turn anyone away at the door. Tell them you are with the meetup group for your discount. Tables will be reserved upstairs and have signs that say MV Meetup. Have fun and post comments on how it went. Thanks

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Comedy Night at the Lowell Brewery
